                    ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸  ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸    ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸   ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸    ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸     ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸   ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸ÃƒÆ’Ã…Â¸
    
  Saddle up for a wilderness adventure!

  Embark on a great equestrian adventure in the wide open spaces of Utah. 
  Enter competitions on your dream horse, care for the animals on your uncle`s 
  ranch and rescue wild mustangs roaming the wilderness.
  Create your perfect horse, deciding its breed, colouring, name and 
  personality
  Wander freely across open environments, exploring your surroundings and 
  rescuing endangered wild horses.
  Show your riding skills by competing with your horse in all-new 
  straight-line and cross country events
  Befriend an adorable foal and a cute pony. Play with them, feed them and 
  gain their trust.
